extendedInfo.description: Movie Food Creator FREE Cooking is the only Branded App of its kind that combines 5 apps in 1. Make your favorite popcorn flavor and watch it pop before your very eyesâ¦ Choose from over 15 popcorn bags and decorate it with tons of silly stickers. Add your favorite Movie Food Combo items and then eat it up! Grill hotdogs on a roller grill and then top them with tons of condiments, relish, sauerkraut, and other silly toppings... then add combo items like french fries and a soda. Select from many different types of Nachos and then choose from more than 20 different toppings to add to your yummy creation. Donât forget to take a picture of your Nachoâs to share with your friends before you eat them! Make your favorite type of milkshake and watch it blend before topping it with more than 25 different toppings and combo items. Try your luck at the Combo Challenge, but watch out for the âbannedâ food. See how many trays you can make in 30 seconds to beat your High Score, you can even cheat by liking us on Facebook and receive an additional 15 seconds on the clock.Get it NOW, itâs FREE!Features:- The only Branded game of its kind to includes 5 Apps in 1- Your Favorite Movie Food, Silly Sounds & Yummy Toppings & Decorations!- Hundreds of decorating combinations included!- Fun for ALL Ages!- BONUS Game (Combo Challenge)

reviews.title: Disappointed..and in my opinion, TACKY..
reviews.comment: There are quite a lot of problems here! -First, the selection screen turns white and I don\'t know where I end up (is it popcorn, or hotdog?)!!! -I can\'t eat the popcorn. Only dull white icons appear. -You could have given the nachos a bit more of fun. You could let players use tongs to get the nachos from the cooker and place in on a small container, then design.  -I wished you could really see how the milkshake was made, not just placing it under the machine. -Plus, when I use the colored cream to decorate

reviews.title: Sneaky Ads.  DON\'T GET IT!
reviews.comment: Seemed like a really fun app, but there is all this stuff that isn\'t part of the mini game, and if you touch ANY of them-thinking that they are part of the game-it takes you to a page on amazon to get you to buy their stupid product! And the game is just plain boring, because you have something like 2 different choices and have to buy all the rest! IT\'S HORRIBLE! Cake maker is WAAAAAAAAAAAAAY better!
